verbose_text: Mutants of either unc-104 / kinesin-3 or its upstream activator, arl-8, have previously been shown to disrupt SV distribution in adult worms : loss-of-function mutants result in a proximal shift of synaptic puncta, while kinesin overactivation leads to the formation of smaller synapses.
evidence: kinesin-3 or its upstream activator, arl-8, have previously been shown to disrupt SV
